name: Hilda Tellioglu
content: Hilda Tellioğlu TU Wien, Favoritenstrasse 9-11/193-04, 1040 Vienna, Austria ©TU Wien Hilda TellioÄlu Assoc. Prof. Dr. Dipl.-Ing. I am an Associate Professor at the Institute of Visual Computing & Human-Centered Technology (E193) at the Faculty of Informatics at the TU Wien (Vienna University of Technology), the Dean of Academic Affairs for Computer Science, the head of the Artifact-Based Computing & User Research Unit (ACUR) (previously Multidisciplinary Design & User User, MDUR), the chair elect of the Steering Committee of the European Society for Socially Embedded Computing (EUSSET), the director of the Center for Informatics and Society (C!S), the scientific director of the Center for Technology & Society (CTS), and the Austrian representative of IFIP TC9. Short C.V. to download. Workshop on Cooperative Intelligence: Human-Artificial Intelligence at Work - 20.07.2025 - Siegen, Germany. For participation contact us. EUSSET Summer School 2025 - 25.-29.8.2025 - Vienna, Austria. Office hours for students As Dean of Academic Affairs for Informatics: Wednesdays, 9-10:00Erzherzog-Johann-Platz 1, 4. FloorPlease contact me if you like to make an appointment outside this slot. As lecturer: Tuesdays, 14-15:00Favoritenstr. 9-11, Stiege 3, 2. Floor Please contact me if you like to make an appointment outside this slot. Hilda Tellioğlu TU Wien, Institute of Visual Computing & Human-Centered Technology Artifact-Based Computing & User Research (ACUR) Favoritenstrasse 9-11/193-04, A-1040 Vienna, Austria Phone: +43.1.58801.193405 Email: hilda.tellioglu@tuwien.ac.at
